io.zero88.jooqx

Interface SQLErrorConverter

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    JooqErrorConverter<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    JooqErrorConverter.JDBCErrorConverter

    public interface SQLErrorConverter
    Represents for a maker that unifies SQL error to a general SQL error when executing SQL command on across among Database SPI
    Since:
    1.0.0
